body_content.explanation: a tall tropical grass with hard, hollow stems:
examples: There are shady tunnels of colossal bamboo (especially welcome in the blazing summers).
In her garden she has bamboos, wonderful rare tree ferns, palm trees and bananas.

body_content.explanation: the stems of this plant, used to make canes (= long sticks), buildings, furniture, and other items, or a single stem of the plant:
examples: Use bamboo canes to support tomato plants.
The tropical-style lobby has potted palms and bamboo furniture.
The children carried long bamboos to chase away the chickens.

body_content.explanation: the fibres (= thread-like parts) of the plant, made into a soft cloth:
examples: Her clothing is made of bamboo and organic cotton.
